030package io.jstach.jstachio.escapers;
031
032import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
033import io.jstach.jstachio.Escaper;
034
035/**
036 * Provides NOOP escaper for working with plain text.
037 *
038 * @author Victor Nazarov
039 * @author agentgt
040 */
041@JStacheContentType(mediaType = "text/plain")
042public final class PlainText {
043
044        private PlainText() {
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Provides the escaper for static lookup.
049         * @return noop like escaper singleton
050         */
051        public static Escaper provider() {
052                return NoEscaper.PlainText;
053        }
054
055}
